entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with flurries at times heavy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
